level.heading: Duration of charter.
level.text: The charters for incorporations named in this chapter and granted before April 11, 1986, may be made perpetual, or may be limited in time by their provisions, subject to the approval of Congress.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-107
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-107, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 26-1352.
